name: FL!PO
description:
A memory game for kids, 

with cute animal pictures of a frog, elephant, cat, hippo, butterfly, koala, lion, tiger, panda, toucan and other animals.
There are 4 difficulty settings which you select by clicking the stars ★★☆☆ on the ancient ruin. Press on the play button ▶️ and you will rise into the sky where the fun begins.

Memorize the animals on the cards and try to find matching pairs, once you found all of them you can click on the refresh button 🔄️ to shuffle the deck and play again, or you click the settings button ⚙️ to get back to the difficulty selection and try a more challenging level.

Have fun and happy memorizing !!!
